testCase.name: home should render main/home page with title Home and user object
about should render main/about page with title About and user object
checkAuthenticated should should redirect to /auth/login if there is no user
checkAuthenticated should call next() if there is a user
checkNotAuthenticated should should redirect to / if there is a user
checkNotAuthenticated should call next() if there is not a user
challenge should render challenge/challenge page with title Challenge and user object
challengeResults should render challenge/challengeResults page with title Results and user object
challengeError should render challenge/error page with title Results and user object
results should redirect to /challenge/error with status code 400 if there is an error finding user
results should redirect to /challenge/error with status code 404 if user is not found
results should render results/results with status code 200 if user is found
createResult should redirect to /challenge/error with status code 400 if error finding user
createResult should redirect to /challenge/error with status code 404 if user not found
createResult should redirect to /challenge/error with status code 404 if error saving user
createResult should redirect to /challenge/results with status code 201 if user succesfully saved
renderRegister should render auth/register page with title Register
renderLogin should render auth/login page with title Login
account should render auth/account page with title Account and user object
register should redirect to /auth/register with a 400 status code if any required fields are missing
register should redirect to /auth/register with a 404 status code if user already exists
register should redirect to / with a 200 status code if user is successfully registered
logout should redirect to the home page
